verbs.description: [V: Hosting] [ARG1: the French president] [ARGM-PRP: for the first official state visit of his administration] , Trump and Macron lavished praise - and even a pair of kisses - on one another Tuesday . ( April 24 )

[R-ARG0: Hosting the French president for the first official state visit of his administration] , [ARG0: Trump and Macron] [V: lavished] [ARG1: praise - and even a pair of kisses -] [ARG2: on one another] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] . ( April 24 )
